mapper.select: select NVL(count(v_num),0) cnt from video_report where v_num = #{v_num}
select * from video_report where m_num=#{m_num} and v_num=#{v_num}

select * from (select aa.v_num,m.id,v.v_title,aa.v_report,v.v_savethumbnail,g.genre_name,a.age_grade_name,rownum rnum from (select v_num,count(v_num) v_report from video_report group by v_num order by v_report desc)aa, video v, member m,genre g,age_grade a where aa.v_num=v.v_num and v_delete=0 and m.m_num=v.m_num and a.age_grade_num=v.age_grade_num and g.genre_num=v.genre_num) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select NVL(count(a.v_num),0) cnt from (select v_num,count(v_num) v_report from video_report group by v_num)a,video v where a.v_num=v.v_num and v.v_delete=0
